#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long 
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	ll t,a[100001],i;
	cin>>t;
	long long fact[12];
	fact[0]=1;
	for(i=1;i<=11;i++)
	{
		fact[i]=i*fact[i-1];
	}
	//cout<<fact[4]<<" "<<fact[2];
	while(t--)
	{
		ll comb,val,r=0,n=0,n1;
		for(i=0;i<11;i++)
		cin>>a[i];
		sort(a,a+11);
		cin>>n1;
		val=a[11-n1];
		//cout<<val;
		for(i=11-n1;i<11;i++)
		{
			if(val==a[i])
			r++;
			else
			break;
		}
		for(i=0;i<11;i++)
		{
			if(val==a[i])
			n++;
		}
		//cout<<n<<r;
		comb=fact[n]/(fact[r]*fact[n-r]);
		cout<<comb<<endl;
	}
}
